selected_quotes: Trump's body language is every bit as brutally manipulative as you'd expect
In the run-up to the 2016 presidental election, Professor Geoff Beattie studies candidate Donald Trump's gestures.
Looming, leering, jabbing and swiping – is Trump's distinctive physicality messing with voters' minds?
Ahead of tonight's final televised debate, Professor Geoff Beattie analyses Donald Trump's body language.
A body language expert deconstructs Donald Trump's style of physical bullying
